name: BongoBeater VR demo
description:
BONGO BEATER VR Demo

A virtual reality rhythm game where the player hits bongos on the beat of the music to destroy incoming meteoroids and gain points.

The player does not need to press any buttons to interact with the bongos, they can be played by being tapped with the controller.

Developed and tested for the Oculus Rift, with UE4.
